Posts.Content: Nov 14, 2008 03:39PM sweet2bme wrote: dang. I had my bilat mastectomy oct 6, and immediate reconstruction after, (lat dorsi) and I feel the whole burning thing constantly, and I always feel like I have an underwire (sounds weird) under my left breast that is waaaaaaaaaaaay too tight when I am trying to sit up. am I nuts???
Posts.Title: Post Mastectomy/Lumpectomy Pain Syndrome mom2two sueUK
